div.p: Domitius [Phannianus, and] Germanus, collectors of money taxes at Elephantine. Zmithis, who is also called [NN], his mother being Thinpsentos, and [NN, his mother being] Thinpachoumis, each of them [has paid] 4 debased drachmas, = [8 debased drachmas], for the contributions of the 12th year of Antoninus Caesar the lord, Phamenoth [day] Translation with slight modifications: Aly, ZPE 212 (2019) 218
